channel.title: Jason Constantine on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Jason Constantine on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Memorial Set for Jason Constantine, Former Co-President of Lionsgate Motion Picture Group
item.description: A celebration of life has been set for Jason Constantine, the veteran movie executive who died on June 3 at age 55. Colleagues, friends and family are welcome to the service at the First Presbyterian
